data.title: Jesse James marries former porn star Bonnie Rotten in backyard ceremony
data.meta_description: Sandra Bullock's ex-husband, Jesse James, married former porn star Bonnie Rotten in a low-key backyard wedding celebration Saturday in Texas.
data.text:
Jesse James and Bonnie Rotten are married!

The famous mechanic, 53, and the former porn star, 29, tied the knot Saturday in Texas in a low-key backyard wedding celebration with their closest family and friends.

‚Äú6.25.22 I can‚Äôt wait to spend the rest of my life with you ‚ú®üôè,‚Äù Rotten captioned an Instagram post confirming the news.

‚ÄúYesterday was the most magical day. I am so thankful to have those close to us join us for our day of love,‚Äù a second post read.

‚ÄúAll the planets were aligned, figuratively and literally. I found my soul mate, I won‚Äôt be letting him go ‚ù§Ô∏è Mr and Mrs James ‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®.‚Äù

James also posted pics and videos from their intimate nuptials via his own account, writing, ‚Äú1 Corinthians 16:14. ‚ÄòLet all that you do be done in love.'‚Äù

He added, ‚ÄúGreatest day ever yesterday!üíúüë∞üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§µüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ô•Ô∏è.‚Äù

For the ceremony, the bride wore a white floor-length gown with a long train and sleeves made of lace. Her short veil cascaded down her long, dark locks, and she completed the look with white cowgirl boots.

Rotten (real name: Alaina Hicks) held a bouquet of pink and white flowers as she made her way to the altar with one of the couple‚Äôs French bulldogs by her side.

The groom opted for a less traditional look, sporting dark gray slacks and a matching vest, which he wore over a white collared button-down and gold tie. He kept things casual by rolling up his sleeves and finishing off the outfit with a cream-colored fedora.

The couple ‚Äî who got engaged in April ‚Äî changed into more comfortable clothing for the reception, where they cut their two-tier cake using a cleaver made by the ‚Äúglorified welder‚Äù himself.

Hicks‚Äô 6-year-old daughter ‚Äî from her first marriage to Dennis DeSantis ‚Äî posed for pictures with the newlyweds. At one point, she even flashed her mom a big grin after indulging in some wedding cake.

The former adult film star has since changed her name on Instagram to ‚ÄúAlaina James.‚Äù

This marks her second marriage and James‚Äô fifth.

The West Coast Choppers founder was married to his first wife, Karla, from 1991 to 2002. They share a daughter, Chandler, and a son, Jesse Jr.

That same year, James said ‚ÄúI do‚Äù to former porn star Janine Lindemulder, who famously covered Blink-182‚Äôs ‚ÄúEnema of the State‚Äù album in nurse attire. They were married for two years and share one daughter, Sunny.

The former ‚ÄúMonster Garage‚Äù host‚Äôs most famous marriage, however, was to Sandra Bullock from 2005 to 2010. After cheating on her, the motorcycle enthusiast told the Daily Mail that he felt like ‚Äúthe most hated man in the world.‚Äù
